issue.title: [Docs] Document how to decode FlightData manually
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15287](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15287). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For context, it was asked on StackOverflow: [https://stackoverflow.com/questions/70629168/](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/70629168/how-to-decode-arrow-flight-flightdata-with-a-pure-grpc-client/70629249)

Since the point of using Protobuf and gRPC was to get compatibility with "simple" Flight implementations, we should document what's necessary.

Also see ARROW-4419 - maybe fixing that would take care of this too.
